fees.description: Retailers administration fee for a dishonoured cheque payment (maximum).
Fee for historical billing data more than two years old.
Manual Read Fee for Type 4A Meter.
Fees for customer-initiated services (ACS) delivered by your distributor. Charged on a cost pass-through basis. Fees vary and are generally set by the AER
Financial institution fee for a dishonoured payment - no more than the fee incurred by the retailer.

electricityContract.terms: Full terms and conditions will be provided in your welcome kit when you become a customer. Alternatively, they can be accessed at  www.ergon.com.au/contracts
electricityContract.variation: Prices are reviewed every 12 months by the regulator and implemented 1 July annually. We will publish details of any price variation on our website.

timeOfUseRates.description: For electricity usage between the hours of 5.00 pm and 8.00 pm, weekdays.
For electricity usage between the hours of 8.00 pm and 11.00 am, all days
For electricity usage between the hours of 11.00 am and 1.00 pm, all days.

singleRate.description: Supply will be available for a minimum of 8 hours per day, but may be reduced in an emergency. Times when supply is available is subject to variation at the absolute discretion of the distributor.
Supply will be available for a minimum of 16 hours per day but may be reduced in an emergency. Times when supply is available is subject to variation at the absolute discretion of the distributor.

greenPowerCharges.description: For 6.22 cents/kWh (inc. GST), you can choose between 2.5% and 100% of your electricity usage matched with electricity from accredited GreenPower sources.

solarFeedInTariff.description: Solar flat feed-in tariff for regional Queensland. This amount is not subject to GST.

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: Starts when retail services for provision of electricity to your premises starts. Concludes when you notify us to stop providing customer retail services or consumption increases to/past 100MWh/yr.
electricityContract.additionalFeeInformation: Fees may apply for additional services. Please see the fees and charges schedule at www.ergon.com.au for further details.
